newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia Bank Negara bills average yield 6.529 pct.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia Bank Negara bills average yield 6.529 pct.

text.p: Malaysia's central bank said it accepted bids at an average yield of 6.529 percent at its auction of 30-day Bank Negara bills for 500 million ringgit.
At the previous auction on December 17 for a similar amount, Bank Negara said it accepted bids at an average 6.625 percent.
The bids accepted were in the high/low range of 6.544/295 percent against 6.69/55 at the previous auction.
Payment for the issue is on Wednesday, which would be met by a 500 million ringgit Bank Negara bill maturity on the same day, money dealers said.
